data.text:
2025 Race Lottery

For the 2025 race lottery, the qualifying period is November 6, 2023 through Sunday November 3, 2024. You must run a qualifier off the 2025 qualifying races list below to enter the 2025 race lottery

We update the list of qualifying races once a year each September. We welcome corrections of factual errors at anytime. While every effort is made to ensure that this information is current, complete and accurate, WS cannot be held responsible for any loss, injury, claim, liability, or damage related to your reliance thereon. WS reserves the right to determine all WS qualifiers. For more information on our criteria for choosing qualifying races click here

An event that is not on the list cannot be used as a qualifier.

We do not allow virtual events to be used as qualifiers.

Please see our Entry Process page for more details.

Events below are official qualifiers for the 2025 Western States Endurance Run. The 2025 qualifying run must be run from Monday November 6, 2023 through Sunday November 3, 2024.
